meta.title: SchoolDigger.com - the Easy Way to Evaluate K-12 School Performance

meta.name: description
meta.content: Find the best elementary, middle, and high schools. Search for schools near any address, compare test scores, sort by school rank, class sizes, and more.
Find the best elementary, middle, and high schools. Search for schools near any address, compare test scores, sort by school rank, class sizes, and more.

meta.name: twitter:description
meta.content: Find the best elementary, middle, and high schools. Search for schools near any address, compare test scores, sort by school rank, class sizes, and more.

div.h4: K-12 school performance data at your fingertips.
K-12 school performance data at your fingertips.
K-12 school performance data at your fingertips.
K-12 school performance data at your fingertips.

div.p: For over document.write(new Date().getFullYear() - 2006); years, SchoolDigger.com has helped millions of parents evaluate school performance and quality. We have test scores, rankings, school and district boundaries, student/teacher ratios, ethnic makeup, and scores of other useful metrics and information for over 120,000 elementary, middle, and high schools in the United States!

br.h4: Start here to find a great school anywhere in the U.S.!

input.name: ctl00$ContentPlaceHolder1$HomePageSearch$txtHPAC
input.placeholder: Type a school or district name, or an address, city, county, zip...

div.br:
To search for schools near your location: press "Nearby (GPS)". Your browser may request permission to give us your location.
To search a specific location: type in an address, city name, county name, or zip code.
To search for a specific school or district: Just start typing the school or district name. Watch for matching entries below where you type.

div.a: See a list of U.S. States
See a list of U.S. Cities

div.div:
© 2006-document.write(new Date().getFullYear());SchoolDigger.com. All rights reserved. (About Us - Contact Us - Privacy Policy - Terms of Use - Remove Ads
- Developers / API )
An Email has been sent to . Thanks for using SchoolDigger.com!
